title: Maisie Williams Says Game Of Thrones Makers Put Strap Across Her Chest To Flatten Breast Growth
text:
Sharing the struggles of maturing and growing breasts during the filming of Game of Thrones, a show Maisie Williams became a part of at the age of 14, the actress who is now 22-years-old revealed how the makers went to drastic lengths and put strap across her chest in order to flatten breast growth.

pinimg.com

This was done in order to hide her body as a woman because Maisie Williams’s character Arya Stark was supposed to be projected as a girl. Maisie said that this had put a negative impact on her self-esteem.

“They would also put this strap across my chest to flatten any growth that had started, and I don't know, that just felt horrible for six months of the year,” Maisie was quoted as saying by USA Today, according to IANS.

eonline.com

This left her feeling “horrible" and “a bit ashamed” of her own body.

"Around season two or three, my body started to mature and I started to become a woman. But Arya was still very much, like, trying to be disguised as a boy”, said Maisie, on Vogue's 24 Hours With Maisie Williams.

Don't Miss 108 SHARES 4.2 K SHARES 1.4 K SHARES 1.6 K SHARES

9gag.com

"I had really short hair and they constantly covered me in dirt and shaded my nose so it looked really broad and I look, like, really manly,” she continued.

newsweek.com

After Game of Thrones ended, Maisie Williams was happy that she can now explore her feminine side. “With this new phase of my style, it is nice to look more feminine and have a real waistline and just embrace the body that I have," she was quoted as saying.

With inputs from IANS
description: Sharing the struggles of maturing and growing breasts during the filming of Game of Thrones, a show Maisie Williams became a part of at the age of 14, the actress who is now 22-years-old revealed how the makers went to drastic lengths and put strap across her chest in order to flatten breast growth.
